data.eml:eml: Biodiversity research of darkling beetles on Socotra Island. Part I. The genus Deretus Gahan, 1900 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Purchart, Luboš (2012): Biodiversity research of darkling beetles on Socotra Island. Part I. The genus Deretus Gahan, 1900 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae). Zootaxa 3153: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211332
